alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 23 at 4:29PM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Stones River Near Donelson affecting Davidson County. For the Stones River...including Donelson...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release release continues. * WHERE...Stones River Near Donelson. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Portions of the Stones River Greenway between Percy Priest Dam and Lebanon Road are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 20.5 feet and steady. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1030 AM CST.
